extendedInfo.description: Spotlighted on Forbes as one of "Best Photo Apps For iOS And Android Tablets" by Amadou Diallo, July 3rd, 2013 More than 5 million downloads!âââââ PicsPlay Pro, The Incredible Photo Editor! PicsPlay Pro contains 200 filters and all editing features which allow you to express the best moments of your life. Photos of your daily life and travelling can be depicted as the most memorable moment. PicsPlay Pro is easier and more convenient than any other editors. Touch and touch! With few taps your photo will be amazingly changed. You can be a professional photographer! â¢ Youtube Video clip Review : http://youtu.be/2FiOPVRg00g"It's an incredibly comprehensive picture editing tool!" - Paul Wilks, Androidtapp.com"if you think that your current photo-editing app isnât enough for your needs, JellyBus Inc. has introduced a great new Android app that you might want to try out."- Waqas Ahmed, Addictivetips.com"Global Partners of Samsung in IFA and Photokina 2012" [ Special Features ] â¢ Take a photo and Load a photo â¢ Undo, Redo, Reset â¢ Compare with an original photo anytime â¢ Crop, Straighten & Rotate â¢ Environmental Settings â¢ 200 Professional filters in 10 themes Themes : Scene, HDR, Blur, ART, Vintage, Grunge, Beauty, Professional, Color Splash, Black & White Control the opacity of filters Favorite and History List Get your own unique effect from unlimited combinations of filters â¢ Live Tilt-Shift 3 types of Blur effect - Linear, Radial, Oval Control the blur area and watch your effect simultaneously â¢ Time Matrix with temporal photographic effects Like a time machine, you can travel time with Time Matrix and apply a variety of effects according to the time you set. â¢ Powerful Editing Tools for both beginners & professionals Exposure -Brightness & Contrast Color - Hue & Saturation White Balance - Color Temperature & Tint Colored Curve & B&W Curve Histogram, Smart Sharpen â¢ Photo Decoration Text - More than 40 Fonts, 80 Colors & Patterns, Color Palette, 14 Styles, 32 Labels Painting - Size Options, 32 Colors & 48 Color-Patterns, Color Palette, 30 Bokeh, 20 Roll-Stamps, Eraser Stamp - Tens of stamps and Speech bubbles, Making a stamp with your photo Border â 34 Border styles, Control roundness and thickness Texture, Lomo Style Vignetting and so on.â¢ Photo Sharing to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Flickr, Kakaotalk, Line etc! (Official apps should be installed)â¢ Save in various resolutionsPicsPlay Pro allows you to save a photo in from SNS optimized sizes up to the size of 2048 px. (The saving size can be differentiated in some Android devices.)â¢ ManualPicsPlay Pro is designed for everyone to use conveniently and easily.Your precious 5 stars encourage us to develop and improve our application constantly. Thank you very much!We are waiting for your feedback:)Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/PicsPlay Email: contact@jellybus.com Homepage : http://www.jellybus.comSince our launch, we've received so much love and countless feedbacks from you. Of those, we've been keeping in mind the features you've wished to see in PicsPlay Pro,and carefully picked out the ones that would bring the greatest value to you for this update.Thank you for the love and we hope you enjoy!

reviews.title: Simply the Best
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe there are not a hundred thousand users of this app by now! I\'ve tried dozens of free & paid photo apps & this by far the best: photo quality & effects-wise. I use this and Pixr-O-Matic, but when I need higher grade of quality to print a photo, I\'ll always use this app, since the effects don\'t downgrade the photo quality. If you\'re a true photography lover & interested in quality effects such as aging, and are not as much into stuff like sticking gaudy conversation bubbles on your already bea
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well, but changing fonts would be helpful
reviews.comment: Have yet to figure out how to change fonts beyond what came with the installation.
reviews.author: Jeffrey C Clarke

reviews.title: One of the top 3
reviews.comment: I own and use PlayPics Pro, PicSay Pro and PicShop Pro. Each one has it\'s own particular advantages over the other. I wish someone would combine the best features of each one into one app. Until then I will use each app for what type of edit, fix, enhancement or add-ons that each app is better at. Those of you who use these apps know what I\'m talking about, that each app has it\'s strong points and weak points depending on what your wanting to do. Try the free versions of these apps to see if it suits you.
reviews.author: Mark Jordan

reviews.title: Love the amazing array of features! Needs to save to original size.
reviews.comment: This is a five star app, but I wanted to subtract half a star because it doesn\'t give the option to work with the photos in their original size. PRO is well worth the price for all the fun things you can do, though, and in most cases the maximum resolution is plenty big enough. The ability to put a freehanded cutout from one photo into another is so cool. Also, this is one of the few apps where you can edit individual color graphs as well. Love the flexibility of the text, freestyle drawing on the photo and the multiple undo/redo levels. Suggestions: allow original size, allow landscape mode (a lot of my photos are landscape) and either put some zoom sliders in various places, or allow us to pinch/zoom and put the \"original\" view into an icon somewhere on the screen.
